input.sentences: the birthday girl wanted to open up her gifts before having cake .
she was surprised by her cheerleader cake !
all the family was there to celebrate her 12th birthday !
this was the most candles on a cake we had seen in some time . she got them all | first try !
[male] brother was excited for his sister | and even more excited for the cake !
output.sentences: My little girl wanted to open her gifts, but we had not had the cake yet.
The cake was a huge hit as we surprised her with a cheerleader cake.
The family came to celebrate, and of course sample the Birthday cake.
When it was time we arranged the candles, and light them on the cake.
After the party my Sister had me come to get to know the latest male she was excited about.
